title: What is the Django admin good for?
summary:
The Django admin is often cited as one of Django's great strengths. With
virtually no coding, you have a functional web interface to administer
your data. However, the admin should not be your (whole) web site. This
talk discusses when you should use the admin and when you should not,
admim customization features from basic to advanced, and how to grow
beyond the admin (even for administration).

Help us caption & translate this video!
